channel.title: Version 3.2 :: Hugo Relearn Theme
channel.description: 3.2.1 (2022-03-25) Fixes [bug] print: fix minor inconsistencies #225 [bug] print: show more than just the title page #224 [bug] theme: align content scrollbar to the right on big screens #223 3.2.0 (2022-03-19) Enhancements [feature][change] mermaid: support differing themes for color variant switch #219 [feature] mermaid: load javascript on demand #218 Maintenance [task] mermaid: update to 8.14.0 #220
